remediation: Avoid using all malicious instances of the create-codecpetjs-bdd-tests package.
title: Malicious Package

vulnDescription.Overview: create-codecpetjs-bdd-tests is a malicious package. This package contains malicious code, and its content was removed from the official package manager. While this package might be attempting to impersonate a valid organization, there is no connection between that organization and this package authorship.
